item.title: RHI Overview
item.description:
WebGPU API

As the previous post has mentioned, I have chosen to use WebGPU API as the foundation for my RHI abstraction layer. In this post, I will talk about the deviations from this foundation API.

Explicit Lifetime Management

WebGPU automatically tracks the lifetime of all GPU objects. This is one of the key points WebGPU is simpler to use. It is similar to Metal 1.0 in a way. However, the trend of modern rendering is that graphics API reduces overhead by asking users to manage their own stuff. Therefore I choose to let users create/destroy GPU objects manually.
